resources.string: To start working with the program, first visit Edit|Dictionaries to add some directory paths where to search for the dictionary files, set up various Wikipedia sites or other sources, adjust dictionary order or create dictionary groups.....

To start working with the program, first visit Edit|Dictionaries to add some directory paths where to search for the dictionary files, set up various Wikipedia sites or other sources, adjust dictionary order or create dictionary groups. And then you're ready to look up your words! You can do that in this window by using a pane to the left, or you can look up words from other active applications.
